name: imagebox
description: ImageBox - AI image generation & prompt workflow (Next.js + Electron)
author: wangyixiao <wangyixiao@users.noreply.github.com>

scripts.electron:dev: npm run electron:compile && concurrently -k "npm run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 -t 60000 && electron ."
scripts.electron:build: npm run electron:compile && npm run db:generate && npm run db:template && npm run build && npm run electron:prepare && electron-builder --publish never
scripts.electron:build:mac: npm run electron:compile && npm run db:generate && npm run db:template && npm run build && npm run electron:prepare && electron-builder --mac --publish never
scripts.electron:build:win: npm run electron:compile && npm run db:generate && npm run db:template && npm run build && npm run electron:prepare && electron-builder --win --publish never
scripts.electron:build:linux: npm run electron:compile && npm run db:generate && npm run db:template && npm run build && npm run electron:prepare && electron-builder --linux --publish never
scripts.electron:build:all: npm run electron:compile && npm run db:generate && npm run db:template && npm run build && npm run electron:prepare && electron-builder --mac --win --linux --publish never
scripts.electron:publish: npm run electron:compile && npm run db:generate && npm run db:template && npm run build && npm run electron:prepare && electron-builder --publish always
